alert.note: Alert for Inland Gulf; Liberty (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 31 at 6:49PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Gulf and southwestern Liberty Counties through 715 PM EDT/615 PM CDT/... At 649 PM EDT/549 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Wewahitchka, or 17 miles northeast of Port St. Joe, moving south at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Wewahitchka, Chipola Cutoff, Honeyville and Dalkeith. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
